ptolemy.homer.widgets

Class AttributeStyleWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.Widget
      • ptolemy.homer.widgets.NamedObjectWidget
        • ptolemy.homer.widgets.GlassPaneWidget
          • ptolemy.homer.widgets.AttributeStyleWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.accessibility.Accessible, MinSizeInterface, NamedObjectWidgetInterface

    public class AttributeStyleWidget
extends GlassPaneWidget
implements MinSizeInterface
    This widget visualizes attributes based on their style definition.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AttributeStyleWidget

        public AttributeStyleWidget(org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.Scene scene,
                            PositionableElement element)
                     throws IllegalActionException
        Create a new instance visualizing the positionable element based on its style definitions. If there is a no style defined, revert to a text field.
        Parameters:
        scene - The scene containing the widget.
        element - The element to visualize.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if there is a problem parsing attribute's style.

    • Method Detail

      • updateValue

        public void updateValue()
                 throws IllegalActionException
        Update the value of the widget based on the attributes expression (if applicable).
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if there is a problem parsing the attribute's expression.

      • getMinWidth

        public java.lang.Integer getMinWidth()
        Return minimal width which is the preferred width of the widget if it's defined.
        Specified by:
        getMinWidth in interface MinSizeInterface
        Returns:
        the minimal width a widget can have or null if there is no restriction.
